Reviews.Title: “great for a budget but reception desk lets it down”
Reviews.Author: estebonbon
Reviews.Content: recently trip amsterdam 3 nights botel perfect cheap chearful dont intend stay accomadation plan explore perfect easy train airport called 2 cost approx 8 euros walked train station followed boat sign botel furthest left dock called cant wrong furthest left goes 1am stop takes approx 10 mins botel soon left ferrys half hour approx fairy regular geting botel reception unfriendly breakfast simple smile welcoming budget hotel didnt expect amazing smile proper welcoming goes didnt feel welcomed fine exactly expected bathroom expected cleaners wasnt impressed clothes bed floor pile professional bit rude folded bed wasnt impressed tried wifi accessible code wasnt arrival reception arrive bike hire doing 15 euros little pricey bikes fab told bike stolen responsible police report key stolen lost pay bikes realise demonstration advise locks etc reception staff helpful finished bikes light hadnt told handed bike feel broken hadnt didnt thank telling wait ages thank thats strange welcoming polite breakfast breakfast fine bacon mainly fat budget didnt expect usual juice etc absolutely fine basic botel sway travel sickness isnt doesnt sway bad feel slightly adds theme boat overall fine paid expecting shame reception interaction staff letting

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”
Reviews.Author: Iliveforholidays88
Reviews.Content: stop tour doesnt look impressive tiny basic bathroom imagine tall people impossible move beds hard clean bedding clean sleeping boat feels bit strange rocking shower wasnt bad stay breakfast massive selection food food quality dining nice clean plenty windows look location hotel strange accidently wrong ferry

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Ashby de la Zouch, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “Very pleasantly suprised”
Reviews.Author: gabbyhau
Reviews.Content: weekend staying botel reading reviews hoping clean bed arrival pleasantly suprised clean nice comfy bed 7 degrees outside nice hot radiator staff friendly cleaned daily bar sold beer cheaper found city breakfast perfectly adequate free ferry huge bonus weekend minor criticism evening music bar little loud ordinary conversation times badly tuned radio station

Reviews.Title: “enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: LindaMCoArmagh
Reviews.Content: visited hotel celebrate husbands 50th found clean tidy helpfull friendly staff breakfast nice views river ij eating found location 15min free ferry journey city enjoyed quiet evenings hotel busy city day amsterdam lovely city explore found people friendly polite

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good”
Reviews.Author: Charley B
Reviews.Content: reading negative views anticipating worse arrived reception staff friendly helpful change double twin changed immediately remained cheerful helpful throughout weekend visit clean warm minus 2 provided ok alarm clock tv explore city sit happy found free ferry amsterdam central ran day extremely frequent weekend bonus night ferry catch drops botel botel minibus pick door free time arrived 4am 230am minibus waiting amazing breakfast gooda helpful yourself affair continental breakfast selection choices busy staff cleaned tables quickly sit bar night dispensing machines late night snacks water yes enjoyed stay value money

Reviews.Title: “Good Value & Clean”
Reviews.Author: mashwilliams
Reviews.Content: botel class hotel swish guest house basic accomodation fantastic price close amsterdam staff helpful friendly shower tiny boat monsoon showers kingsize beds warm tv channels entertain hot water basic clean shower beds towels spotless towels changed daily bed night thats clean cosy fine spend hours enjoying hotel book else pillows theres pancakes try book waterside boat dont hear coming home late parking free ferry main town takes 10 min happy botel book

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodation”

Reviews.Content: hotel unique experience arrived train airport found ferry little difficult marked found staying hotel free 15 mins accomodation clean laid attentive cost internet extreme voiced opinion breakfast included start day fancy plenty bar sit play cards days outing bar staff accomodating demands bar shut

Reviews.Content: free ferry ride botel staff friendly helpfull basic clean bed sheets everyday clean tv phone suite clean cleaned daily stayed twice am 3 stay value money bufet breakfast stuff yourself stupid selection

Reviews.Title: “Botel”
Reviews.Author: HollyandNick
Reviews.Content: stayed botel twice definately stay ferry ride boat free slightly time consuming worth rates hotels centre amsterdam breakfast shower warm luxury pay complaints

Reviews.Title: “40 minutes from Amsterdam, poor room, poor service”

Reviews.Content: hotel technically amsterdam longish ferry ride downtown plan taking 40 minutes dam hotel converted ship type youd cruise ship means whenever ship goes rocks rolls disrupt sleep shower actual tiny tiny dumpy thin mattress sits wooden frame sharp edges corners ship hit edge hard ive bruises prove furniture chipped topped builtins narrow dressing table tv bolted theres suitcase chair bent metal elementary school threw 30 ago filthy keeping suitcases beds isnt exactly convenient guy desk checked wasnt 10 minutes sign desk line folks waiting surly booking specified free internet denied tried charge 6 hour lobby dinner surly standing doorway 2 friends smoking smoking sign course walk reeking cloud door dinner neighborhood chance theres walking distance info available hotel eat short ferry ride amsterdam private club allow outsiders eat near dock walk strange student housing shipping containers getting dark creepy neighborhood breakfast food choices adequate hard clean plate clean table hot water tea nasty taste yesterdays coffee stay else youll happier

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and cheerful”
Reviews.Author: view_from_the_pier
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights recently friends twin whilst accommodation luxurious overall pretty value money bathroom particularly petite fine using hotel base highly recommend earplugs walls pretty thin hairdryer supplied breakfast fine cereals toast eggs bacon sausages teacoffee surprise assumed continental breakfast coffee tea facilities issue tea addicts drinks boat evening reasonably priced difficult attention communicate barman struggled correct change tried include coins larger note help confused prompted correct change friends staying requested moved handle radiator control cold moved warmer half hour reception staff friendly helpful main issue botel location view location positive charm pop forward hotel throughout day ideal hotel free ferry runs central station fairly regular stop midnight replaced alternate ferry shuttle bus ferry busy bikes engine cars aboard board takes 10mins finding pier initially easiest arrived sign near berth 3 completely canal realised exited central station wrong direction entrance central station road berth ferry dock left enjoyed commute hotel quiet location botel docked probably recommend hotel party amsterdam commute annoying impractical overall value money compared stories heard amsterdam hotels actually pretty nice

Reviews.Title: “It's okay...Abit of a pain having to catch a ferry back and fourth...”
Reviews.Author: sky l
Reviews.Content: firstly catch ferry botel ferry stand left leave half hour stop midnight didnt stay late dodgy city little bit annoying catching ferry time alot walking comes checking boyfriend amongst 40 odd people arriving lobby regarding booking reservations payments found easily standard lay bathrooms unbelievably flooded bathroom whilst shower im excellent city cheeky smoke window bread 2 swans water love tv dutch english channels radio popular chart music 2 vending machines drinks snacks breakfast truly terrible crap finding cafe restaurant amsterdam wasnt fun ferry takes stop youll walk mile city planning visiting coffee shops id beware cycle lanes city lethal cycle fast amsterdam busy found confusing especially evening overall botel ok fair girl reception lovely oh boat rocks

Reviews.Title: “Good comfortable, value for money base to visit Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: McCreery-Morbach
Reviews.Content: botel essentially floating travellodge exception breakfasts superb unlike travellodge basic comfortable beds comfy easy straight central station onto free ferry boats harbour hotel spending days thames neighbouring boats russian submarine 3 schooner ships enjoyed day look amsterdam coming evening local restaurant eat drink evening watching ships coming forth north sea hustle bustle amsterdam nightlife thats botel easily accessible centre overpriced lot hotels centre cantine restaurant nearby thoroughly recommended recommend 23 day passes buses trams getting amsterdam finally western docks intersting perspective amsterdam time 10 tram

Reviews.Title: “ITS CLEAN”
Reviews.Author: hanspan22
Reviews.Content: 2nd stay botel reason gone simply clean location fantastic 10 min max ferry journey centraal station ferrys busy day city able sleep properly beds bit comfy bathroom seen leave clothes bathroom showering soaked times stayed botel requested double bed hotel told book direct pay breakfast salad bag thats gone bit brown plenty eat city food evening told boat food times stayed kitchen staff ham cheese toasties nice meal recommend yes dont expect

Reviews.Title: “If you plan on drinking, do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: gosensgo8
Reviews.Content: boyfriends parent recommended botel disappointed location botel harbour actual city access botel ferry positive ferries free 1am hour ferries dock 100 metres hotel morning noisy swaying sick staff staff unfriendly accommodating whatsoever seeing real dutch culture girl front desk assistance guides rack spoke perfect english day pretending couldnt understand saying super dont mind cramped wont bad bathrooms super ferries coming hard balance shower plan hotel swaying morning hangover pure nightmare

Reviews.Title: “Good points and bad points”

Reviews.Content: night stay botel amsterdam staff friendly efficient looks dont employ person reception bar busy struggling guy doing breakfast clean cosy telly plenty english channels including bbc corridor vending machine beer midnight cap relaxing sleeping floating boat bar lovely little tv lounge pinball machine bar reasonably priced snacks burgers toasties bad location bit pain fun ferry hotel tedious bathroom cramped didnt rate shower amenities basic basically soap dispenser apart ok enjoyed amsterdam bar boat docked smart decent drink

Reviews.Content: ad misleading advertising chic town load nonsense boat yard doesnt advertising 10 miles car town eve ferry hotel 1 10 seat mini bus dock amsterdam ruined eve trip doubt ill amsterdam rip

Reviews.Title: “worst experience ever!”
Reviews.Author: maarten079
Reviews.Content: night stay total disaster pipes heating system ticking constantly sleeping impossible amsterdam alcohol otherwise driven home middle night wife complained desk whine cause complained holes curtain ceiling water stains am enthusiastic hotel

Reviews.Title: “Just what you need for a few days in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Kayleigh207
Reviews.Content: stayed botel 21st birthday boyfriend clean cleaners round everyday clean staff friendly helped bathroom bit alot breackfast severed 730 1030 basic breackfast includes toast sauage bacon egg bit odd ham cheese salad boat hotel centre runs half hour takes 10 mins feel botel bobs alot time whe ferry goes feel lie bed hairdriers travel tv english

Reviews.Title: “Budget place,lovely staff,clean cabins”

Reviews.Content: folks saywe decided break awaywe botel fitted feel glad herefrom moment entered boat feel welcomethe shes moored short ferry ride central ride view amsterdam enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Very Enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: neeciescotland
Reviews.Content: enjoyable days break botel true value money double ground floor clean yes bathroom dont party shower experienced minimal smell complained windows onto water facing submarine watch ferry booked land water view botel look onto water pier wall water view dont wasting money adding water view breakfast sausages boiled eggs bread rolls continental cold bar cereals toast machine hot cold drinks machines preserves eat bar prices reasonable compared amsterdam city prices hot meals offer snacks toasties cheeseburgers check quick easy found staff polite night 1 reception fun staff botel boat alongside meals private function appeared shipyard factory renovation luxurious bar serving food shops provisions coming train station required brilliant weekend pity weather wet cold stop typical tourists fun days getting home balance settle movement comes staying boat forth worth definately return

Reviews.Title: “Bad location, tatty rooms and unfriendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Alan_L_10
Reviews.Content: told botel cheap stay werent planning staying hotel happy book 30 minute ferry ride thats youve station chipped paint rust door frames coffin sized shower tea coffee facilities unfriendly staff ill stay

Reviews.Title: “A Hotel on a boat? The Botel!”
Reviews.Author: Molokov
Reviews.Content: brilliance hotel boat called botel novelty unique stay bathrooms tiny sit toilet youve arm sink shower look window onto water swans ducks

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed the city pity about the accommodation”

Reviews.Content: day travelling looking forward getting lie wash disappointed arrival botel staff unfriendly barely looked checking disturbing compact bathroom thank goodness spend time sight seeing city recommend

Reviews.Title: “disgusting bathroom, toilet backwash after flushing, no lifts, stairs only”
Reviews.Author: ChrisMay
Reviews.Content: inconveniently located ferry utilise shuts midnight catch shuttle botel arrived bathroom atrocious toilet flushed neighbours dinner previous night toilet bowl worse stay

Reviews.Title: “I'm still bobbing!”

Reviews.Content: stayed partner birthday sleeping botel odd experience staff friendly helpful arrival free ferry seamed nick time save waiting dated facelift bed comfi clean bathroom dingy wasnt clean breakfast basic start day advise eating day snack menu limited

Reviews.Content: bathrooms comfortable matress excellent heater effective personally hotel 1 lack directions airport central station tell ferry catch call hotel description wasnt precise time complicated ferry hotel provides time table ok 2 lack variety breakfast sort juice orange single fruit bread didnt taste anyway theres reastaurant inside bar serves kinds sanwiches chips
